author: ghost
body: Please mark prerelease as prerelease. This helps downstream in a build automation etc. when using GitHub APIs. For example currently `v6.1.0-preview.2` is showing up in https://api.github.com/repos/powershell/powershell/releases with `"prerelease": false`.

comments.author: ThomasNieto
comments.body: @TravisEz13 / @iSazonov This doesn't seem to be an issue anymore. Can this issue be closed?

title: Please use pre-release option in GitHub releases
